title: Bed Curtain
description: multicolored embroidery depicting overall scene of fanciful birds perched on curvaceous flowering trees; very bottom depicts rolling hills with a deer in the center and other small animals prancing about the ground; double layer backing; light brown background
creditline: The Walter C. and Mary C. Briggs Purchase Fund and Gift of Don and Diana Lee Lucker, Ford Bell, Myron Kunin, and Barbara S. Longfellow
